alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 3:55PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Saline and southeastern Pulaski Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 355 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mabelvale, or near Southwest Little Rock. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Bryant... Southwest Little Rock... Shannon Hills... Wrightsville... East End... Ironton... Geyer Springs... Mabelvale... State Fairgrounds... Sweet Home... Otter Creek... Alexander... Baseline... Higgins... Vimy Ridge... Parkers-Iron Springs... Woodson... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 125 and 137. Interstate 430 near mile marker 1. Interstate 530 between mile markers 1 and 13. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
